name: Real Minecraft - Level 1
description:
Play the frist level of mienfarcst.  ⛏⛏⛏⛏

Mine the tree, Use arrOw keys and down to minedown,  space key to breack objects

Press e to eat apple 🍎

Dont lose the game!1

I am really sorry for this, but you know what we do at yops.itch.io and that's right I make terrible games. Lol be funny if this got on the front page. like and share and comment!
